pr_title: Adds tag support for Enchantments, Potions, and TileEntityTypes

timeline.message: Add support for tags to enchantments and tile entity types
Add some tests and also add potion tags

timeline.bodyText:
What's up with these hunks being changed randomly?
I don't see a reason for these to be changed, from looking at the files
timeline.author: TheCurle

replies.bodyText: iirc it is just because that represents what line it is starting on so because there are more lines being injected above that means that anything being added lower down gets added later line number wise.
replies.author: pupnewfster

replies.bodyText:
I don't see any other patches in these files (with these hunk indexes), these should not be changed?
Else every single line would have one of these..
replies.author: TheCurle

replies.bodyText: Same with the first one in this file. You don't change anything above it, yet it is still changed.
replies.author: TheCurle

replies.bodyText:
Okay. that one was me being blind, my bad.
Now explain this: https://github.com/MinecraftForge/MinecraftForge/pull/7379/files#diff-9b95d3b9cf5c13f0915da0244317d899R3
replies.author: TheCurle

replies.bodyText: There are 9  lines added to the file and the patch lines below are shifted by 9, seems pretty sane to me
replies.author: RANKSHANK

replies.bodyText: Because a line is being added here curle? https://github.com/MinecraftForge/MinecraftForge/pull/7379/files#diff-9b95d3b9cf5c13f0915da0244317d899R9
replies.author: pupnewfster

replies.bodyText:
The first one. There is nothing being added above it, and the line being added inside it shouldn't affect the position.
Whatever, i'll just chalk it down to Git being weird.
I redact my first statement :P
replies.author: TheCurle
